title: Issue loading into a game
body:
When i go to load into games after selecting my champion it closes the whole of league down. then when i go to reconnect it does the same :/

is anyone else having this problem or something similar, i have even tried clicking log in instead of pressing enter and the same thing happens??? i have also uninstalled and reinstalled league twice but it keeps happening.

could anyone be of any help please?

replies.body:
If you are running LoLReplay at all, make sure to temporarily uninstall this program.  It has been known to cause this exact issue with the latest patch.

If you aren't using it however, it seems like there is a problem with your computer connecting to the individual game server, which is why the Loading Screen never appears.  In order to hopefully resolve this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  There are a ton of steps there, but they are all crucial in hopefully resolving this issue.

Let me know if you still can't see the Loading Screen!
